doc:
William S. Hart https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_S._Hart 0 William Surrey Hart (December 6, 1864 – June 23, 1946) was an American silent film actor, screenwriter, director and producer. He is remembered as a foremost western star of the silent era who "imbued all of his characters with honor and integrity." During the late 1910s and early 1920s, he was one of the most consistently popular movie stars, frequently ranking high among male actors in popularity contests held by movie fan magazines. William_Surrey_Hart ( December_6_,_1864 – June_23_,_1946 ) was an_American_silent_film_actor , screenwriter , director_and_producer . He is_remembered as a_foremost_western_star of the_silent_era who "_imbued all of his_characters with honor_and_integrity . " During the_late_1910s and early_1920s , he was one of the_most_consistently_popular_movie_stars , frequently_ranking_high among male_actors in popularity_contests held by movie_fan_magazines .
